title: ‘Potomac’ Episode 2, ‘Salt Lake City’ Episode 4, and ‘Beverly Hills’ Reunion Part 2
description:
Rachel begins the episode by breaking down some Bravo news with Callie Curry (1:30), before diving into Season 7, Episode 2 of ‘The Real Housewives of Potomac’ (14:39). Then, Rachel is joined by Jodi Walker to discuss Season 3, Episode 4 of ‘The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City’ (31:34), as well as ‘The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills’ Season 12 Reunion, Part 2 (54:58).
Host: Rachel Lindsay
Guests: Callie Curry and Jodi Walker
Producers: Devon Manze and Chelsea Stark-Jones
Theme Song: Devon Renaldo
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
